desc: LifeVac is a unique lifesaving medical device that is revolutionizing he way choking is treated. LifeVac creates suction and negative pressure that will remove the lodged food or object in the event of choking. LifeVac is designed with a one-way valve to prevent any air from pushing food or objects downward.

layout.text:
Protect your loved ones in a choking emergency.
LifeVac is the choking first aid device that saves lives.
